DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study assess safety tolerability AMG 785 follow single dose subcutaneous ( SC ) intravenous ( IV ) administration healthy men postmenopausal woman .
DOC.brief_title: A First-in-human Study Evaluating AMG 785 Healthy Men Postmenopausal Women
